headline: Canada Nickel Announces the Referral of the Company's Crawford Project to the Major Projects Office by the Government of Canada
summary: Canada Nickel Company Inc. ("Canada Nickel" or the "Company") (TSXV: CNC; OTCQX: CNIKF) is pleased to announce that its flagship Crawford Nickel Project ("Crawford" or the "Crawford Project") has been officially referred to the Major Projects Office by the Government of Canada. The Company was pleased to host this important announcement by the Honourable Tim Hodgson, Minister of Energy and Natural Resources on November 13th, 2025 at its Timmins regional headquarters.
